verse: परमिममुपदेशमाद्रियध्वं निगमवनेषु नितान्त खेद खिन्नाः विचिनुत भवनेषु वल्लवीनामुपनिषदर्थमुलूखले निबद्धम्
overall_meaning: Revere and embrace completely the supreme teaching in the forests of scriptures, explore in the abodes of beloveds the meaning of Upanishads, contained like grains in the hollow of a mortar, weary of distress.
